title: Tour de France Stage 9: Pogačar Can’t Drop Rivals in Wild Gravel Stage, Turgis Kicks to Breakaway Win
content:
'Visma only focused on me': Pogačar irrepressible but can't make the difference in all-attacking assault on controversial gravel stage.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 9: Pogačar Can’t Drop Rivals in Wild Gravel Stage, Turgis Kicks to Breakaway Win on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
